item.title: March 15
item.description: Tonight, I spent twe precious hours for managing my blog website of Hugo. The reason why the process is so much difficult is that I didn’t understand the meaning of the below code. So, the most important experience is that we must carefully treat any tips, warnnings, and precurors. Error: command error: failed to load config: "D:\blog\hugo.yaml:226:1": failed to unmarshal YAML: yaml: line 226: mapping values are not allowed in this context
